attributes.action: Allow Dependents (Esp. those in the UK) Under the Care Worker Visa (SOC 6135).
attributes.additional_details:
We respectfully call on the UK Government to
*Allow dependents of H&C worker visa holders(SOC 6135) stay with them in the UK
*Recognise the importance of family unity & its role in the mental wellbeing of care workers
*Acknowledge the positive impact that supporting families will have on care worker retention & the quality of care provided
*Prioritise the wellbeing of care workers & their families, recognising that happy & healthy workforce is essential for the success of UK’s healthcare system
attributes.background: We indulge the Government to reconsider&amend the policy on dependents in the UK from the Visa. It creates significant emotional, social, &practical hardships for us, ultimately affecting our ability to provide High-Quality Care, Worker Retention, & causing Family Separation, Emotional Strain,

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716517
